sources.title: The Best Of Locarno 74
sources.description: Three minutes, an unforgettable edition. See you on 3 August 2022. Special thanks to: - Max FOTOGRAFO (drones) - Sinplus, with Brake The Rules (music) #Locarno74 Locarno Film Festival http://www.locarnofestival.ch Tag your related content with #Locarno74 http://facebook.com/FilmFestivalLocarno http://twitter.com/FilmFestLocarno http://instagram.com/filmfestlocarno
